descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Foreword-[/size][/color][/font][/b]


Apology for my bad English, it is not my first language, please excuse me for using google translate on responses.

This mod adds a new follower.

This mod always need [b][u]Dawnguard

[color=#ff0000][size=4]V2.0:[/size][/color]
[/u][/b]1:Fix Dianest's eyebrow color is very light
2:Fix CTD from skeleton
3:Fix Race have a BUG race_Drace
4:Fix armors Value to 1.00
5:Fix FaceTint
6:Fix Candlehearth Hall
7:add V CBBE but,no TERA outfit,only Elven Armor

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-How to find her-[/size][/color][/font][/b]

Go to [b][u]Candlehearth Hall[/u] .[/b]
You can see her.


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5][b]-Description-[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[size=3]This is a simple follower mod[/size] .
[size=3]My friend  DiorSoul[/size] use my CME_save [size=3]to make this mod.

[/size][size=3]name:Dianest
level:the same to your char,max 255
[/size][size=3]outfit:[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/][size=3]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female by asianboy345 [/size][/url][size=3]
[/size]weapon:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42366/]Dragonspear by ImsumDave [/url]

Videos:
[youtube]Dxxs3PLRYSA[/youtube]
by youdojo,thank you.

[youtube]YEcATmATvxk[/youtube]
by Supertin,thank you.     

[youtube]oxCLoxdQEAM[/youtube]
by GTAHammer,thank you.

[youtube]xrj6ZUBPxIc[/youtube]
by DomRPGs,thank you.
[youtube]yK_OQTDk90A[/youtube]
by MetalboyII,thank you.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Installation-[/size][/color][/font][/b]

Just use NMM to install it and choose a hair for your like.
In some guy's ENB, Dianest's eyebrow color is very light. if you want fix this problem, you can download Dianest_brow. 7z

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Used Resources-[/size][/color][/font][/b]

[url=http://http//www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?][size=4]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS [/size][/url]by xp32
